text:
Had an issue with one of HubSpot's core themes, this error essentially meant none of the js-modules rendered - they all failed silently meaning the site was completely blank.

I feel like if any of the modules on the page fail the page as a whole should at least return a non 200 status code? Without this theres a risk that your site gets reindexed with no content.
While I didn't use anything custom on this specific site, I have been using cms-react for a while - and am still really enjoying it.
